text: Kim Dae-Eui (born 30 May 1974) is a South Korean professional athlete. He is best known as an association football player. He was a member of the Korean national team.NationalFootballTeams.com, Kim, Dae-Eui; retrieved 2012-9-3. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Season Club League Apps Goals Korea Republic Korea Republic Korea Republic League League 1997 Hanil Bank Japan Japan Japan League League 1998 JEF United Ichihara J1 League 4 0 Korea Republic Korea Republic Korea Republic League League 1999 Ulsan Hyundai Mipo Dockyard Dolphin 2000 Seongnam Ilhwa Chunma K-League 24 5 2001 30 2 2002 40 18 2003 25 3 2004 Suwon Samsung Bluewings K-League 36 7 2005 25 5 2006 36 5 2007 20 4 2008 21 1 2009 Country Korea Republic Korea Republic 257 50 Country Japan Japan 4 0 Total Total Total 261 50 ==National team statistics== Korea Republic national team Korea Republic national team Korea Republic national team Year Apps Goals 1997 2 0 1998 0 0 1999 0 0 2000 0 0 2001 0 0 2002 1 0 2003 9 3 2004 1 0 Total 13 3 ==International goals== :Results list South Korea's goal tally first.
